                    },

                                Operator = "Include",
                                Values = 
                                {
                                    "*",
                                },
                            },
                        },
                        FailingPeriods = new AzureNextGen.Insights.V20200501Preview.Inputs.ConditionFailingPeriodsArgs
                        {
                            MinFailingPeriodsToAlert = 1,
                            NumberOfEvaluationPeriods = 1,
                        },
                        MetricMeasureColumn = "% Processor Time",
                        Operator = "GreaterThan",
                        Query = "Perf | where ObjectName == \"Processor\"",
                        ResourceIdColumn = "resourceId",
                        Threshold = 70,
                        TimeAggregation = "Average",
                    },

            Enabled = true,

using Pulumi;
using AzureNextGen = Pulumi.AzureNextGen;

class MyStack : Stack

                {

                    WebHookProperties = 
                    {
                        { "key11", "value11" },
                        { "key12", "value12" },
                    },
                },
            },
            Criteria = new AzureNextGen.Insights.V20200501Preview.Inputs.ScheduledQueryRuleCriteriaArgs
            {
                AllOf = 
                {
                    new AzureNextGen.Insights.V20200501Preview.Inputs.ConditionArgs
                    {
                        Dimensions = {},
                        FailingPeriods = new AzureNextGen.Insights.V20200501Preview.Inputs.ConditionFailingPeriodsArgs
                        {
                            MinFailingPeriodsToAlert = 1,
                            NumberOfEvaluationPeriods = 1,
                        },
                        Operator = "GreaterThan",
                        Query = "Heartbeat",
                        Threshold = 360,
                        TimeAggregation = "Count",
                    },
                },

    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}List of resource type of the target resource(s) on which the alert is created/updated. For example if the scope is a resource group and targetResourceTypes is Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines, then a different alert will be fired for each virtual machine in the resource group which meet the alert criteria{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">

    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The period of time (in ISO 8601 duration format) on which the Alert query will be executed (bin size).{{% /md %}}</dd>

For example if the scope is a resource group and targetResourceTypes is Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines, then a different alert will be fired for each virtual machine in the resource group which meet the alert criteria{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="windowsize_nodejs">
<a href="#windowsize_nodejs" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">window<wbr>Size</a>
</span> 
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/string">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The period of time (in ISO 8601 duration format) on which the Alert query will be executed (bin size).{{% /md %}}</dd>

</dl>
{{% /choosable %}}

<h4 id="conditionfailingperiods">Condition<wbr>Failing<wbr>Periods</h4>
{{% choosable language nodejs %}}
> See the <a href="/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/azure-nextgen/types/input/#ConditionFailingPeriods">input</a>   API doc for this type.
{{% /choosable %}}

> See the <a href="https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/pulumi/pulumi-azure-nextgen/sdk/go/azure-nextgen/insights/v20200501preview?tab=doc#ConditionFailingPeriodsArgs">input</a>   API doc for this type.

{{% choosable language csharp %}}
> See the <a href="/docs/reference/pkg/dotnet/Pulumi.AzureNextGen/Pulumi.AzureNextGen.Insights.V20200501Preview.Inputs.ConditionFailingPeriodsArgs.html">input</a>   API doc for this type.

{{% choosable language csharp %}}
<dl class="resources-properties">

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="minfailingperiodstoalert_csharp">
<a href="#minfailingperiodstoalert_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Min<wbr>Failing<wbr>Periods<wbr>To<wbr>Alert</a>
</span> 
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">double</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The number of violations to trigger an alert. Should be smaller or equal to numberOfEvaluationPeriods. Default value is 1{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="numberofevaluationperiods_csharp">
<a href="#numberofevaluationperiods_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Number<wbr>Of<wbr>Evaluation<wbr>Periods</a>
</span> 
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">double</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The number of aggregated lookback points. The lookback time window is calculated based on the aggregation granularity (windowSize) and the selected number of aggregated points. Default value is 1{{% /md %}}</dd>

</dl>
{{% /choosable %}}

            title="Optional">

    </dt>

</dl>
